name: Trial (DurmanGames)
description:
Hello there!

This game made for GoedWare game jam. Jam theme: Enhance.

Trial is game where you need to solve some riddles and discover new locations.

There are few more things that I wanted to add to the game but i didn't have enough time. Something like normal homes and harder riddles, it's sad( I hope you have fun when playing my game.
